byline.contributor: Myra Noveck contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

abstract: Israeli security officials detain two young Palestinian boys for throwing stones at Israeli bus, latest example of country's crackdown on children.
lead_paragraph: Relatives of Ahmad Zaatari, 7, and his cousin Mohammed Zaatari, 12, said the boys were accused of throwing stones at an Israeli bus and were detained for hours.

headline.main: Israel Detains Palestinian Boys, 7 and 12, for Throwing Stones
headline.print_headline: Israel Held Boys, 7 and 12, Saying They Threw Stones

snippet: Relatives of Ahmad Zaatari, 7, and his cousin Mohammed Zaatari, 12, said the boys were accused of throwing stones at an Israeli bus and were detained for hours.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
